biotools.summary: The Electronic Laboratory Information and Management Utensil for Molecular Diagnostics (ELIMU-MDx) is a web-based, open-source platform for storage, management and analysis of diagnostic qPCR data. A webapplication for managing, documenting and result analyzing of aPCR Data.

bioschemas.name: ELIMU-MDx
bioschemas.summary: The Electronic Laboratory Information and Management Utensil for Molecular Diagnostics (ELIMU-MDx) is a web-based, open-source platform for storage, management and analysis of diagnostic qPCR data. A webapplication for managing, documenting and result analyzing of aPCR Data.
